sen.j: 驚いた大炊と延寿があわてて止めに入り、義朝は「こやつの性根を試してやっただけだ」と太刀を納めた。
sen.e: The host, Oii, was taken aback and hastily intervened to prevent a tragedy. Yoshitomo sheathed his sword saying; "I was just testing this lad's mettle".
